thread.title: Christopher Church
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Christopher Church

author: Christopher Church
title: Christopher Church
text: Needed another shower identified to get the right parts . This you can do via their website along with a few pics very easy and hey hoe back comes the required information for a fix. Parts come quickly and not a problem that I live and work on the Isle of weight Chris Church
